blogPost.excerpt:
Hold On out now: https://JustinBieber.lnk.to/HoldOn 

Pre Order Justice Out 3/19: https://justinbieber.lnk.to/Justice 


Listen to Holy, Lonely, & Anyone here: https://JustinBieber.lnk.to/OutNow 


Director: Colin Tilley
Producer: Katelyn Pippy
Starring: Justin Bieber & Christine Ko


When you or someone you love is diagnosed with cancer, it’s hard to know where to start. The FCancer CareLine is here to help. Go to https://www.letsfcancer.com/careline/ to learn more.


Follow Justin: 
http://facebook.com/justinbieber
http://twitter.com/justinbieber
http://instagram.com/justinbieber


Sign up for Justin’s newsletter: http://justinbiebermusic.com 


#HoldOn #Justice #JustinBieber
blogPost.body:
Hold On out now: https://JustinBieber.lnk.to/HoldOn 

Pre Order Justice Out 3/19: https://justinbieber.lnk.to/Justice 


Listen to Holy, Lonely, & Anyone here: https://JustinBieber.lnk.to/OutNow 


Director: Colin Tilley
Producer: Katelyn Pippy
Starring: Justin Bieber & Christine Ko


When you or someone you love is diagnosed with cancer, it’s hard to know where to start. The FCancer CareLine is here to help. Go to https://www.letsfcancer.com/careline/ to learn more.


Follow Justin: 
http://facebook.com/justinbieber
http://twitter.com/justinbieber
http://instagram.com/justinbieber


Sign up for Justin’s newsletter: http://justinbiebermusic.com 


#HoldOn #Justice #JustinBieber
blogPost.title: Justin Bieber - Hold On

localize.title: 贾斯汀比伯 - 坚持
localize.description:
Hold On out now: https://JustinBieber.lnk.to/HoldOn 

预购正义3/19出炉：https://justinbieber.lnk.to/Justice 


在这里收听Holy, Lonely, & Anyone: https://JustinBieber.lnk.to/OutNow。


主任： Colin Tilley
制片人: Katelyn Pippy Katelyn Pippy
主演： Justin Bieber & Christine Ko


当您或您所爱的人被诊断出患有癌症时，很难知道该从哪里开始。FCancer CareLine在此提供帮助。请访问 https://www.letsfcancer.com/careline/ 了解更多信息。


请关注Justin。
http://facebook.com/justinbieber
http://twitter.com/justinbieber
http://instagram.com/justinbieber


订阅Justin的通讯：http://justinbiebermusic.com 


#HoldOn #JustinBieber的正义#

localize.title: 賈斯汀比伯 - 堅持
localize.description:
Hold On out now: https://JustinBieber.lnk.to/HoldOn 

預購正義3/19出爐：https://justinbieber.lnk.to/Justice 


在這裏收聽Holy, Lonely, & Anyone: https://JustinBieber.lnk.to/OutNow。


主任： Colin Tilley
製片人: Katelyn Pippy Katelyn Pippy
主演： Justin Bieber & Christine Ko


當您或您所愛的人被診斷出患有癌症時，很難知道該從哪裏開始。FCancer CareLine在此提供幫助。請訪問 https://www.letsfcancer.com/careline/ 瞭解更多信息。


請關注Justin。
http://facebook.com/justinbieber
http://twitter.com/justinbieber
http://instagram.com/justinbieber


訂閱Justin的通訊：http://justinbiebermusic.com 


#HoldOn #JustinBieber的正義#

next.excerpt:
The official music video for Bruno Mars, Anderson .Paak, Silk Sonic's new single "Leave the Door Open"
Download/Stream: https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/LTDOID

Directed by Bruno Mars and Florent Dechard 
Phil Tayag - creative consultant

Limited Edition Collectible CD Single Available Here: https://smarturl.it/LTDO_CDSINGLE

🔔 Subscribe for the latest official music videos, live performances, lyric videos, official audio, and more: https://Atlantic.lnk.to/BMsubscribe
 
🎵 Listen to the Best of Bruno Mars playlist ➤ https://bit.ly/3bbslw8​ 
🎵 Watch Bruno Mars’ Official Music Videos ➤ https://bit.ly/2U7I3mi​ 

Get Bruno Mars merchandise! https://brunom.rs/brunomarsstore 

Connect with Bruno: 
http://www.brunomars.com​ 
http://www.instagram.com/brunomars​ 
http://www.twitter.com/brunomars​ 
http://www.facebook.com/brunomars 

Connect with Anderson .Paak.: 
https://www.facebook.com/AndersonPaak 
https://www.instagram.com/anderson._paak/ 
https://twitter.com/AndersonPaak 

Connect with Silk Sonic: 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Instagram 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Twitter 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Facebook 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/Spotify 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/AppleMusic 
https://SilkSonic.lnk.to/TikTok 

Lyrics: 
What you doin
(what you doin)

Where you at
(where you at)

Oh you got plans  
(you got plans)

Don’t say that       
(shut yo trap)

I’m sippin wine     
(sip sip)

In a robe               
(drip rip)

I look too good    
(look too good)

To be alone         
(wooohooo)

My house clean  
(house clean)

My pool warm   
(pool warm)

Just shaved        
(smooth like a new born)

We should be dancing, romancing
In the east wing and the west wing
Of this mansion, wus happenin

I aint playin no games
Every word that I say 
Is coming straight from the heart
(so if you tryna lay in these arms)

Imma leave the door open
(imma leave the door open)
Imma leave the open girl
(Imma leave the door open, hopin)

That you feel the way I feel
And you want me like I want you tonight baby
(tell me that you’re coming through)

You’re so sweet 
(so sweet)

So tight
(so tight)

I won’t bite
(ahh ahh)

Unless you like
(unless you like)

If you smoke
(what you smoke)

I got that haze
(purple haze)

And if you’re hungry girl I got filets
(woohooo)

Ooh baby don’t keep me waiting
There’s so much love we could be making
I’m talking kissing, Cuddling
Rose pedals in the bathtub
Lets jump in, Its bubblin

I aint playin no games
Every word that I say 
Is coming straight from the heart
(so if you tryna lay in these arms)

Imma leave the door open
(imma leave the door open)
Imma leave the open girl
(Imma leave the door open, hopin)

That you feel the way I feel
And you want me like I want you tonight baby
(tell me that you’re coming through)

La la laaa la la la la la 
(I need you baby)

La la laaa la la la la
(I gotta see you baby)

La la laaa la la la la 
(Girl I’m tryna give you this)
(aaaaahhhhhhhhhh)

Imma leave the door open
(imma leave the door open)
Imma leave the open girl
(Imma leave the door open, hopin)

That you feel the way I feel
And you want me like I want you tonight baby
(tell me that you’re coming through)


The official YouTube channel of Atlantic Records artist Bruno Mars. 11x GRAMMY Award winner and 27x GRAMMY Award nominee Bruno Mars is a celebrated singer, songwriter, producer, and musician with iconic hits like "The Lazy Song", "That's What I Like", "Just The Way You Are", "24K Magic", "Locked Out Of Heaven", and "When I Was Your Man". His legendary body of work also includes blockbuster albums such as Doo-Wops & Hooligans, Unorthodox Jukebox, and 24K Magic, as well as era-defining collaborations like "Uptown Funk" with Mark Ronson, "Finesse" with Cardi B, and "Nothin' On You" with B.o.B. Forever classic, yet supremely innovative, Bruno continues to redefine music, style, and popular culture, pushing the boundaries of pop, R&B, funk, soul, hip-hop, and dance, and remains as influential as ever.

#BrunoMars #AndersonPaak #SilkSonic #LeaveTheDoorOpen

歌词： 
你在做什么
(你在做什么)

你在哪里？
(你在哪里)

哦，你有计划  
（你有计划）

不要这样说       
(闭上你的嘴)

我在饮酒     
(小酌)

穿着长袍               
滴滴答答

我太帅了    
(太好看)

独自一人         
(呜呼)

我的家很干净  
(房屋清洁)

我的池子暖和了   
(池温)

刚刮完        
（光滑如初）

我们应该跳舞，浪漫
在东翼和西翼
在这栋房子里，我们发生了

我不是在玩游戏
我说的每一句话 
是发自内心的
(所以如果你想躺在这些怀里)

我把门打开
（即将离开门打开）
我要离开这个开放的女孩
(Imma leave the door open, hopin)

你的感觉和我的感觉一样
你要我就像我今晚要你一样，亲爱的。
(告诉我你要过来)

你真好 
（如此甜蜜）

这么紧
（如此之紧）

我不会咬人的
(Ahh ahh)

除非你喜欢
(除非你喜欢)

如果你抽烟
(你抽什么)

我得到了那个雾气
(紫霞)

如果你饿了，女孩，我得到了菲力斯。
(呜呜)

Ooh baby don't keep me waiting
有这么多的爱，我们可以做。
我说的是亲吻，拥抱。
浴缸里的玫瑰踏板
让我们跳进去吧，它在冒泡

我不是在玩游戏
我说的每一句话 
是发自内心的
(所以如果你想躺在这些怀里)

我把门打开
（即将离开门打开）
我要离开这个开放的女孩
(Imma leave the door open, hopin)

你的感觉和我的感觉一样
你要我就像我今晚要你一样，亲爱的。
(告诉我你要过来)

啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦 
（我需要你，宝贝）

啦啦啦啦啦啦
（我得看看你，宝贝）

啦啦啦啦啦啦 
(女孩，我想给你这个)
(啊啊啊啊啊啊)

我把门打开
（即将离开门打开）
我要离开这个开放的女孩
(Imma leave the door open, hopin)

你的感觉和我的感觉一样
你要我就像我今晚要你一样，亲爱的。
(告诉我你要过来)


大西洋唱片艺人布鲁诺-马尔斯的官方YouTube频道。11次格莱美奖获得者和27次格莱美奖提名者布鲁诺-马尔斯是一位著名的歌手、作曲家、制作人和音乐人，他的标志性歌曲包括 "The Lazy Song"、"That's What I Like"、"Just The Way You Are"、"24K Magic"、"Locked Out Of Heaven "和 "When I Was Your Man"。他的传奇作品还包括《Doo-Wops & Hooligans》、《Unorthodox Jukebox》、《24K Magic》等大片专辑，以及与Mark Ronson合作的《Uptown Funk》、与Cardi B合作的《Finesse》、与B. o.B.永远的经典，但又极富创新精神，布鲁诺继续重新定义音乐、风格和流行文化，推动流行、R&B、放克、灵魂、嘻哈和舞蹈的界限，并一如既往地具有影响力。

#BrunoMars #AndersonPaak #SilkSonic #LeaveTheDoorOpen#。

大西洋唱片藝人布魯諾-馬爾斯的官方YouTube頻道。11次格萊美獎獲得者和27次格萊美獎提名者布魯諾-馬爾斯是一位著名的歌手、作曲家、製作人和音樂人，他的標誌性歌曲包括 "The Lazy Song"、"That's What I Like"、"Just The Way You Are"、"24K Magic"、"Locked Out Of Heaven "和 "When I Was Your Man"。他的傳奇作品還包括《Doo-Wops & Hooligans》、《Unorthodox Jukebox》、《24K Magic》等大片專輯，以及與Mark Ronson合作的《Uptown Funk》、與Cardi B合作的《Finesse》、與B. o.B.永遠的經典，但又極富創新精神，布魯諾繼續重新定義音樂、風格和流行文化，推動流行、R&B、放克、靈魂、嘻哈和舞蹈的界限，並一如既往地具有影響力。
